snippet: MALLARD--Henry, MD. Service Program for Older People (SPOP) is deeply saddened by the loss of our esteemed Medical Director and Psychiatrist, Dr. Henry Mallard. Henry was a long time staff member and a well respected colleague, teacher, advisor, and friend. Our deepest condolences to his wife Laura Osinoff Mallard and his family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MALLARD--Henry, MD. Service Program for Older People (SPOP) is deeply saddened by the loss of our esteemed Medical Director and Psychiatrist, Dr. Henry Mallard. Henry was a long time staff member and a well respected colleague, teacher, advisor, and friend. Our deepest condolences to his wife Laura Osinoff Mallard and his family. 1/3
